name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NetSuite Help Center Actual Page Title

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts the title of what you have opened in the actual tab title, and changes the tab icon, in the NS Help Center.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extremely lightweight extension that puts the title of whatever you are looking at in the actual tab title (including search queries), and changes the tab icon, in the NetSuite Help Center. This allows us to profit of having many tabs opened, comfortably.
